}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:19.300
    | text      = Endorsements and testimonials are really interesting things according to the law.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:23.440
    | text      = When you're advertising a product, one of the more powerful ways someone might try and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:26.980
    | text      = discuss the efficacy of said product is to vouch for it working personally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:30.980
    | text      = I know this works because it worked for me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:33.659
    | text      = There are rules about how those are used.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:37.820
    | text      = The FTC is pretty clear about how they can and can't be used.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:41.380
    | text      = And one of the chief guidelines is that if you're expressing an endorsement from someone
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:45.940
    | text      = else, you have to accurately express their beliefs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:49.980
    | text      = You have to represent them accurately.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:52.480
    | text      = So if Ted Anderson and Rob Doo don't believe that Young Jevity products were responsible
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:56.940
    | text      = for their knee recoveries, Alex just committed a crime.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:00.519
    | text      = So they would have to under oath say, yes, absolutely, I have a reasonable basis for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:05.579
    | text      = believing that Young Jevity helped me get my ACL back.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:09.820
    | text      = What are those surgery scars?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:11.900
    | text      = Hold on now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:13.179
    | text      = Furthermore, making unsubstantiated claims in the context of a testimonial in no way
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:18.280
    | text      = gets you off the hook for making unsubstantiated claims.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:21.320
    | text      = If Young Jevity is marketing by having Alex talk about unsubstantiated and misleading
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:25.300
    | text      = medical claims, they are still liable for those claims.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:28.500
    | text      = It's not like, hey, Alex said it's fine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:30.579
    | text      = That's not how it works.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:32.019
    | text      = Also, by FTC rules, Alex really fucked up because, quote, an advertisement employing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:38.500
    | text      = endorsements by one or more consumers about the performance of an advertised product or
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:42.380
    | text      = service will be interpreted as representing that product, that the product or service
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:47.019
    | text      = is effective for the purpose depicted in the advertisement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:50.219
    | text      = Therefore, the advertiser must possess and rely upon adequate substantiation, including,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:56.380
    | text      = when appropriate, competent and reliable scientific evidence to support such claims made through
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:00.780
    | text      = endorsements in the same manner an advertiser would be required to if they had made the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:04.539
    | text      = representation directly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:07.019
    | text      = Because he used two testimonials endorsements, the law now interprets this as a medical claim
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:12.420
    | text      = that needs to be supported by evidence in exactly the same way as if Young Jevity had
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:16.739
    | text      = come out and said, our product cures ACL tears.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:20.739
    | text      = Because Alex used two examples, and at no point did they say something like, these results
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:25.219
    | text      = are not typical, or something similar as a disclaimer, he effectively committed a crime.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:30.059
    | text      = Perhaps the most important breach of ethics here, though, is that the two testimonials
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:33.820
    | text      = are being offered, they're from people with material connections to the company they're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:37.860
    | text      = making claims about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:39.300
    | text      = Rob Dew is the InfoWars Nightly News Director, and Young Jevity is one of InfoWars main sponsors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:44.980
    | text      = At this point, InfoWars Life and InfoWars Health are basically just resellers of Young
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Rob Dew's salary is in part subsidized by Young Jevity, so his testimonial is tainted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:55.380
    | text      = Now, it is completely ethical when Trump goes to one of his own golf courses, tweets out

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Similarly, Ted is not an impartial party.

    | text      = He syndicates Alex's show, so he has a financial interest in promoting their sponsors.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Additionally, Ted syndicates Peter Glidden's show, as well as the shows of multiple other
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = representatives of Young Jevity.

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = He is deeply involved with the company, so his testimony is deeply, deeply tainted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:37.980
    | text      = The FTC is pretty clear that using these sorts of testimonials are an example of deceptive
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:42.860
    | text      = marketing, which is 100% what's being done.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:47.460
    | text      = A lot of that legal language is for parsing very specific, different, little, tiny changes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:53.219
    | text      = here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:54.219
    | text      = It's a great example of the layman being able to understand the law pretty instinctively.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:59.219
    | text      = When you hear that, if you have no idea, you have no familiarity with the American legal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = system whatsoever.

{{TranscriptBlock
